post.text: Remember- Crooked Hillary Clinton is a WORLD CLASS LIAR- with terrible JUDGEMENT!

comment.author: Keith
comment.text: CROOKED Hillary Clinton, a name that will live in infamy, no good thing will come of Crooked Hillary, she's a natural road block to everything historicly honorable and dignified about being American. SHE HAS NO F%$#@N CLUE what the hell she is doing. She only views things for her own benefit (she even made it a campaign slogan), but Trump got it right ON, she's "CROOKED HILLARY", at the expense of the American people, she will get rich on our BLOOD and foreign MONEY and bad deals for our country! Pretty slick ole CROOKED HILLARY!

replies.author: Cameron
replies.text: She should trademark it...because thia country will never forget...

replies.author: Clarissa
replies.text: drumph is so happy that millions of AMERICANS lost thousands of dollars from their 401k's today. quote " It's a good thing" WHAT A MORON!!!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.author: Keith
replies.text: Clarissa So you think he's talking about 401Ks, IDIOT! Go support CROOKED HILLARY, she thrives on stupid people

replies.author: Lori
replies.text: Yep, pretty slick OLD woman she is! She has NOT A CLUE how to run THE White House!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
